title: Baby meets his parents
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Care and hygiene
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Children - Health and hygiene
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Emotions in children
description: Episode of Series "Personality Development". Illustrates the concept that the baby is introduced to the world about him through parental provision for his biological needs. Three of the environmental factors influencing development are illustrated; the need for food, the need for unrestrained, normal elimination of body wastes and the need for protective care and love to foster feelings of security.
